comment.author: 22948027@N02
comment._content: Text on the negative in Norwegian, first picture: HB Ruggen under fuld fart - Whale catcher Ruggen under full steam. Text under first picture: Ut paa fangst! - Out hunting! Second pic: Fugleliv paa fangstfeldtet - Birds on the hunting fields. Third pic: "Hval i sigte" - "Whale!" or equivalent cry from the lookout when a whale is sighted. fourth: "Den jages" - It is hunted
